snippet: A final vote on the legislation is scheduled for next week in the lower house of Parliament, where the bill is expected to pass.
abstract: French Senate approves bill to allow same-sex couples to wed and adopt children, leaving France poised to join small group of nations that have fully legalized gay marriage, despite an unexpectedly vocal campaign by conservative opponents.
lead_paragraph: A final vote on the legislation is scheduled for next week in the lower house of Parliament, where the bill is expected to pass.

headline.seo: French Senate Passes Same-Sex Marriage Bill
headline.main: French Senate Approves Same-Sex Marriage Bill
headline.print_headline: French Senate Approves Same-Sex Marriage Bill

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
